Elita/Windlord:

Elita woke up and she giggled and smiled when she looked her dad. She 
licked him and nuzzled  against him.

"Don't be so tought with yourself"said kindly Windlord "YOu should 
better go to CR, my friend,  we have a lot job to do... Get her 
back... We would do it altught we have to come in Pred's base with 
all the army there"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Kup/Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Kup: No, I dont think he has returned yet, Windlord.
> 
> Just then Rodimus flew into the base, landed and deactivated his 
boosters. Rodimus nearly collapsed from his wounds. He stumbled to 
the assembly of Maximals.
> 
> Rodimus looked down at Elita in Cam's arms, tears formed at his 
optics, as he took his daughter, hugging her to him.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I have to thank you guys for not letting me get 
killed out there. If I did Elita would have noone, and there wouldn't 
be a chance of getting Nightlight back. I'm sorry I lost control, I 
should have dont better as commander.
> 
> He kisses Elita's forehead.
> 
>
